title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + A plan for tracking the local economy
description: A plan for tracking the local economy provides eight key indicators for understanding the economic health of a region, including employment, construction, spending, and production data. The text also explains how to obtain and interpret this data.
